Package it.polimi.adaptanalyzertool.metrics

Class ArchitectureMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.adaptanalyzertool.metrics.ArchitectureMetrics
  • public final class ArchitectureMetrics
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the metrics for the architectures.

    It has to be used as a static class since no object must be instantiated before calling the methods that are all public and static.

    See Also:
    Architecture

    • Method Detail

      • GlobalAvailabilitySystem

        public static double GlobalAvailabilitySystem​(Architecture architecture,
                                              double systemTargetAvailability)
        Defines the availability of the components that are in the architecture as probability that are all active in a given instant.

        A better availability of a component in the architecture implies a better Fitness Ratio w.r.t. Availability that is reflected in a better global availability.

        Higher numbers mean better availability.

        Calculates the Global Availability of System as specified in the thesis by Zanotti of 2016-12 at page 31.

        Parameters:
        architecture - the architecture to be analyzed.
        systemTargetAvailability - the system target availability required.
        Returns:
        the Global Availability of the System.
        See Also:
        FitnessRatioAvailability(double, double)

      • GlobalCostSystem

        public static double GlobalCostSystem​(Architecture architecture,
                                      double systemTargetCost)
        Defines the total cost of the components in an architecture w.r.t. the cost of each individual component.

        Calculates the Global Cost of System as specified in the thesis by Zanotti of 2016-12 at page 32.

        Parameters:
        architecture - the architecture to be analyzed.
        systemTargetCost - the system target cost.
        Returns:
        the global Cost of the system.
        See Also:
        FitnessRatioCost(double, double)

      • TotalStaticAvailability

        public static double TotalStaticAvailability​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,ComponentGroup> architectureComponentGroups)

        This methods calculate the Availability of an architecture without considering actual workflows of the architecture.

        It considers all components as used and considers a call to the main service to use always all the components.

        Parameters:
        architectureComponentGroups - the groups that the components form when they are replicated.
        Returns:
        the total availability of the architecture without considering any workflow.

      • calculateTerminalGroupAvailability

        public static double calculateTerminalGroupAvailability​(ComponentGroup componentGroup)

        Calculates the availability of a terminal group aof components.

        Parameters:
        componentGroup - the group used to perform the calculations.
        Returns:
        the avaialbility in ninentynine notation.

      • TotalCost

        public static double TotalCost​(Architecture architecture)

        Calculates the total cost for the specified architecture.

        The architecture cost is the sum of the cost of every component that are in the architecture.

        Parameters:
        architecture - the architecture to be analyzed.
        Returns:
        the total cost for the specified architecture.

      • SuitableForCost

        public static boolean SuitableForCost​(Architecture architecture,
                                      double systemTargetCost)
        Checks if an architecture is suitable for the target cost.
        Parameters:
        architecture - the architecture to be analyzed.
        systemTargetCost - the target cost.
        Returns:
        true if the architecture is suitable, false otherwise.

      • SuitableForAvailability

        public static boolean SuitableForAvailability​(Architecture architecture,
                                              double systemTargetAvailability)
        Checks if an architecture is suitable for the target availability.
        Parameters:
        architecture - the architecture to be analyzed.
        systemTargetAvailability - the target cost.
        Returns:
        true if the architecture is suitable, false otherwise.

      • CheckAllArchitectures

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Double,QualityHolder> CheckAllArchitectures​(Architecture architecture)
        Creates all possible Architecture with the specified components.
        Parameters:
        architecture - the base architecture containing all components.
        Returns:
        a QualityHolder object containing all the min/max value for every quality and the respective architecture.

      • getComponentGroups

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,ComponentGroup> getComponentGroups​(Architecture architecture)

        Creates the groups that contain the components that all provide and require the same services.

        Formally a group contains a component and all its redundant copies.

        Parameters:
        architecture - the architecture that needs to be analyzed.
        Returns:
        a HashMap containing all the groups whose keys are the name of the main component.
